controller

Class PMController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PMController

  • public class PMController
extends java.lang.Object
    The PMController class provides access to all the different Controller classes needed by View classes as well as the controllers itself. It also takes care of calculating a KDF to the given master password and validates the given master password as long as it is set.
    Author:
    sopr010

    • Method Detail

      • setMasterPassword

        public void setMasterPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set a new master password. The master password is encrypted via a KDF and then this method will update the current PasswordManager instance.
        Parameters:
        password - A string containing the new master password.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the given string is null or empty.

      • validateMasterPassword

        public boolean validateMasterPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Check whether a given master password is actually correct for the currently selected database.
        Parameters:
        password - A string containing the password to check.
        Returns:
        true if the password is the current database's master password; else false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the given string is null or empty.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - When the password manager is not properly initialized and no secret key is set.
